articles.author: Jesse Holland, Patrick L. Stumberg
articles.title: UFC 277 results, live stream play-by-play updates | Pena vs. Nunes 2 - MMA Mania
articles.description: UFC 277 live stream: Results and play-by-play updates for Julianna Pena vs. Amanda Nunes-led MMA championship pay-per-view (PPV) card on ESPN+ TONIGHT (Sat., July 30, 2022) at American Airlines Center in Dallas, Texas.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: China conducts ‘live-fire’ military exercise near Taiwan, warns Pelosi not to visit - Global News
articles.description: Pelosi, who would be the highest-ranking American elected official to visit Taiwan since 1997, has yet to confirm whether she will go.
articles.content: China said it was conducting military exercises Saturday off its coast opposite Taiwan after warning Speaker Nancy Pelosi of the U.S. House of Representatives to scrap possible plans to visit the isl… [+1888 chars]
